headline: Citizens Business Conditions Index™ Shows Modest Expansion in Q4
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., January 29, 2025--The national Citizens Business Conditions Index™ (CBCI) rose to 51.0 in the final quarter of 2024, bolstered by solid corporate revenue trends and sustained strength in the service sector. The reading indicates that business conditions improved modestly in the fourth quarter, as the Federal Reserve continued to lower interest rates and election-related uncertainty abated.
